sqlMap.select: SELECT COUNT(*) AS totalUser , SUM(CASE WHEN createTime > DATE_FORMAT(NOW(), '%Y-%m-%d') THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) AS todayUser FROM user_info
sqlMap.insert: INSERT INTO STATISTICS_RAW (userAction, message, logTime) VALUE (#action#, #message#, #loggingTime#)
sqlMap.select:
SELECT logDate AS logDate , userAction AS action , actionCount AS count FROM STATISTICS WHERE logDate BETWEEN #fromDate# AND #toDate#
AND userAction = #actionType#
ORDER BY logDate

SELECT DATE_FORMAT(logTime, '%Y-%m-%d %H:%h:%s') AS loggingTime , userAction AS action , message AS message FROM STATISTICS_RAW WHERE logTime BETWEEN CONCAT(#fromDate#, ' 00:00:00') AND CONCAT(#toDate#, ' 23:59:59') ORDER BY logTime LIMIT #from#, #count#
SELECT COUNT(1) FROM STATISTICS_RAW WHERE logTime BETWEEN CONCAT(#fromDate#, ' 00:00:00') AND CONCAT(#toDate#, ' 23:59:59')
SELECT COUNT(*) AS cnt FROM USER_INFO
sqlMap.delete: DELETE FROM STATISTICS_RAW WHERE logTime LIKE CONCAT(#value#, ' %')
